sources.title: Black Angels (1970) God forgives. The Black Angels don't! Biker Exploitation Film
sources.description:
Two motorcycle clubs clash when a police officer stirs conflict between the black Choppers (led by Knifer) and white Satan's Serpents (led by Chainer). Watch as tensions escalate through Hollywood street races, clubhouse confrontations, and unexpected twists.

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/_PoWYZSHgRk

Written & Directed by Laurence Merrick

Starring:
• Des Roberts - Chainer
• John King III - Johnny Reb 
• Bobby Johnson - Knifer 
• James Whitworth - Big Jim
• Linda Jackson - Jackie
• Clancy Syrko - Lt. Harper

Genres: Action, Drama
Release date: October 14, 1970

metadata.Plot: When an African-American biker gang is tricked into believing that a white biker gang is planning a war, all hell breaks loose.
metadata.Actors: Des Roberts, John King III, Linda Jackson
